metadata.title: CVE-2021-39656 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: In __configfs_open_file of file.c, there is a possible use-after-free dueto improper locking. This could lead to local escalation of privilege inthe kernel with System execution privileges needed. User interaction is notneeded for exploitation.Product: AndroidVersions: Android kernelAndroid ID:A-174049066References: Upstream kernel

criterions.comment: linux: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
